description: Enterprise techniques used by HAPPYWORK, ATT&CK software S0214 v1.0
name: HAPPYWORK (S0214)

techniques.comment: can download and execute a second-stage payload.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
can collect system information, including computer name, system manufacturer, IsDebuggerPresent state, and execution path.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
can collect the victim user name.(Citation: FireEye APT37 Feb 2018)
